patterns_discovered: Using Base from src.config.database for model inheritance
Comprehensive database model with detailed timestamps and indexes
Implementation of to_dict() method for easy serialization
Static method for category calculation in NPSResponse
Multiple indexes for optimizing query performance
gotchas_discovered: Score categorization uses strict boundaries (0-6: detractor, 7-8: passive, 9-10: promoter)
Nullable fields strategically used for optional data like comments and follow-up notes
Metadata stored as string for flexibility (interaction_metadata)
recommendations: Add validation for score range in NPSResponse model
Consider using Enum for interaction_type and trigger_type
Add documentation for complex indexing strategies
